vicedtools.gcp package

Submodules

vicedtools.gcp.api module

Utilities for uploading data to GCP.

vicedtools.gcp.api.upload_csv_to_bigquery(source_file, schema, clustering_fields, table_id, bucket_name, blob_name='temp.csv')

Uploads a CSV to BigQuery via GSC.

Uploads the file to GSC, imports it into BigQuery and then deletes the file from GSC.

Return type:

None

Parameters:

  • source_file – The path to the csv file to import.

  • schema – The BigQuery schema to use.

  • clustering_fields – A list of fields to use for clustering.

  • table_id – The BigQuery table_id to use.

  • bucket_name – The name of the GSC bucket to use as an intermediary for the import.

  • blob_name – The name of the GSC blob to use when uploading the source file to GSC.

vicedtools.gcp.format module

Utilities for formatting data for upload to GC.

vicedtools.gcp.format.create_student_details_gc_csv(compass_student_details_file, save_path)

Creates a csv for uploading to GC.

Return type:

None

Parameters:

  • compass_student_details – a student details export csv from Compass. Can be downloaded using vicedtools.compass.export_student_details or directly from https://[schoolID].compass.education/Services/FileDownload/CsvRequestHandler?type=37

  • save_path – the path to save the csv
